name: KAXAA
description: The Kaxaa Token is a utility token used to access proprietary real estate data on the Kaxaa Platform and for use as currency in real estate transactions. The value of the Kaxaa Token is stabilized and determined by the proprietary Kaxaa Index algorithm based on real world real estate market indicators. The Kaxaa Token may be used in real world real estate transactions as a stabilized "currency" in and out of the Kaxaa platform.
